summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to summer youth education and community service activity; authorizing the Superintendent of the Department of Parks and Recreation to utilize additional youth in its Youth Engaged in Service (YES) program to increase 1995 summer program staffing; creating an additional Seattle Aquarium Youth High School Intern position; reducing an expenditure allowance in the 1995 Budget of the Seattle Center; and reappropriating a like amount to the 1995 Budget of the Department of Parks and Recreation; and expressing support for a similar use of available funds for 1996.
